Private_State_Token_API.summary: NOTE Experimental The Private State Token API provides a mechanism for conveying trust in a user's authenticity from one browsing context to another, without sharing the user's identity or allowing their activity across websites to be tracked.

Private_State_Token_APIUsing.summary: This page explains how to use the Private State Tokens API to conveying trust in a user's authenticity from one browsing context to another.
